name: RADical heuristics
description:
They are here to take stuff, and you're here to take names.

A quote from yours truly:

My first ever turn-based experiment to have gone somewhere! You can attack and defend, and there's one enemy to fight...

UI is also very pretty. I never did it like this before.

Alas.... It is not deserving of much. In the future though, expect a "full" version of what was intended to be.

Enjoy what is there, though!

2021, Uneven Prankster

Made with Godot Engine 3.3
